front.title: Extension Formats for Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation (ULE) and the Generic Stream Encapsulation (GSE)

abstract.t: This document describes a set of Extension Headers for the Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation (ULE), RFC4326. The Extension Header formats specified in this document define extensions appropriate to both ULE and the Generic Stream Encapsulation (GSE) defined to support the second generation framing structure defined by Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB) family of specifications.
